info.description: Rule assignment assigns compliance rules for portfolio.
info.title: Compliance Rule Assignment

post.description:
This is responsible for creating a new Rule Assignment Record.
(-- api-linter: core::0133::http-uri-parent=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because complianceRuleAssignments is the parent collection --)

patch.description:
IMPORTANT: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.
Throws NOT_FOUND when record does not exist

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

parameters.description:
List of fields to be updated.
Warning: Please ensure you understand the implications of using a field mask. And more precisely the fact you need all fields mentioned to be present in your payload.
Also, portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot be updated separately. If you want to add either portfolios or rules configurations to your field mask, please ensure that you add portfolios and all rules configurations.
parameters.name: updateMask

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsComplianceRuleApplicabilityType.description:
Defines possible way rule assignment can be applied.

 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_APPLICABILITY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Apply to unspecified.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_APPLICABILITY_TYPE_ASSIGNED_IN_AGGREGATE: Apply to assigned portfolio or portfolio group in aggreagte.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_APPLICABILITY_TYPE_ASSIGNED_INDEPENDENTLY: Apply to each portfolio independently.

enumsComplianceRuleAssignmentReviewState.description:
Defines possible states of rule assignment.

 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Rule assignment state unspecified.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_DRAFT: Rule assignment in 'draft' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_PROPOSED_READY_FOR_TESTING: Rule assignment in 'proposed ready for testing' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_PROPOSED_REVIEW_REQUIRED: Rule assignment in 'proposed review required' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_PROPOSED_REVIEW_REJECTED: Rule assignment in 'proposed review rejected' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_APPROVED_REVIEW_REQUIRED: Rule assignment in 'approved review required' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_APPROVED_REVIEW_REJECTED: Rule assignment in 'approved review rejected' state.
 - COMPLIANCE_RULE_ASSIGNMENT_REVIEW_STATE_APPROVED: Rule assignment in 'approved' state.

enumsComplianceSeverity.description:
- COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_WARNING: The severity is warning
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_RESTRICTION: The severity is restriction
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_SILENT_ALARM: The severity is silent alarm.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_SECURITY_LANDING: The severity is security landing.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_TIMING_ISSUE: The severity is timing issue.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_GAIN_LOSS_SENSITIVE: The severity is Gain/Loss sensitive.
enumsComplianceSeverity.title: Enumeration of possible severity

enumsComplianceTestDetailOperator.description:
- COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_LESS_THAN: The operator is less than ('<n')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_LESS_THAN_EQUAL: The operator is less than or equal to ('<=n')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN: The operator is greater than ('>n')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN_EQUAL: The operator is greater than or equal to ('>=n')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_BETWEEN: The operator is between, not inclusive ('>n1 and <n2')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_BETWEEN_INCLUSIVE: The operator is between, inclusive ('>=n1 and <=n2')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_EQUAL_TO: The operator is equal to ('=n')
 - COMPLIANCE_TEST_DETAIL_OPERATOR_NOT_EQUAL_TO: The operator is equal to ('!=n')
enumsComplianceTestDetailOperator.title: Enumeration of possible test detail operators

v1ComplianceRuleAssignment.title: ComplianceRuleAssignment describes the compliance rules assigned to a portfolio

prohibitionRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Prohibition Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

concentrationRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Concentration Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

valueAtRiskRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each VaR Rule.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::prefix-required-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because 'Value at Risk' is the name of the rule type --)
(-- api-linter: core::0140::prepositions=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because 'Value at Risk' is the name of the rule type --)
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

scriptedRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Scripted Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

tradeRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Trade Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

counterpartyRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Counterparty Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

portfolioNames.description:
Portfolio name(s) to which rule is assigned.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

approvalCategory.title: Rule assignment approval category (e.g. Compliance or Investments. See Decodes table - COMPL_PERM_CAT) - Mandatory

ruleAssignmentSource.title: Source of the Rule Assignment (e.g client Guideline or Regulatory. See Decodes table - COMPL_DOC_SRC). - Mandatory whle creation

category.title: The rule assignment's category. - See Decodes table - COMPL_CATS

effectiveDate.title: Date when this rule assignment was or will be activated. - Mandatory while creation

effective.description:
The rule assignment's effective flag , defines if the rule assignment is effective.
By default it is false.

implementationNote.title: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment implementation notes

excerpt.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment excerpt.

reference.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment reference links.

regulator.description:
Regulating body of the the rule assignment.
It is a field when rule assignment source is 'REGULATORY'.

deadline.title: Informational field indicating in how many days the violation must be actioned

jurisdictionCountryCode.description:
Jurisdiction country code.
It is a field when rule assignment source is 'REGULATORY'.

documentationLink.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment documentation links.

overrideAction.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment override action.

resolutionAction.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment resolution action.

terminationDate.description: Date and time when this rule assignment would be terminated.

constraintApplicabilityType.title:
The rule assignment's applicability using which we understand
whether the rule assignment has port group inheritance on the selected portfolios

assignmentName.title: The name of the rule assignment - used as a human-friendly identifier

resolutionRequiresFourEyesApproval.description:
The rule assignment's violation4EyesFlag flag.
By default it is false.

disclosureRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Disclosure Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

infoRuleConfigurations.description:
Rule names and associated customizable components of each Information Rule.
Warning: Portfolios and rules configurations are linked and cannot therefore be updated separately. In order to publish a change on either portfolios or rule configurations, please ensure you provide all portfolios and rules configurations you want the system to retain.

ruleName.title: Compliance rule name - Query must provide either a rule name of porfolio (or portfolio group) name

portfolioName.title: Name of a portfolio or portfolio group - Query must provide either a rule name of porfolio (or portfolio group) name

assignmentIds.description: List of assignment ids. It is an optional field.

v1ComplianceRuleAssignmentSearchEntry.title: ComplianceRuleAssignment describes the compliance rules assigned to a portfolio

prohibitionRuleConfigurations.description: Severity of the Prohibiion rules associated with this assignment.

concentrationRuleConfigurations.description: Test details and severity of the Concentration rules associated with this assignment.

valueAtRiskRuleConfigurations.title:
Severity of the VaR rules associated with this assignment.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::prefix-required-field=disabled

scriptedRuleConfigurations.description: Severity of the Scripted rules associated with this assignment.

tradeRuleConfigurations.description: Severity of the Trade rules associated with this assignment.

counterpartyRuleConfigurations.description: Severity of the Counterparty rules associated with this assignment.

portfolioNames.description: Portfolio name(s) to which rule is assigned.

approvalCategory.title: Rule assignment approval category (e.g. Compliance or Investments. See Decodes table - COMPL_PERM_CAT)

ruleAssignmentSource.description: Source of the Rule Assignment (e.g client Guideline or Regulatory. See Decodes table - COMPL_DOC_SRC).

category.title: The rule assignment's category. - See Decodes table - COMPL_CATS

effectiveDate.description: Date when this rule assignment was or will be activated.

effective.description:
The rule assignment's effective flag , defines if the rule assignment is effective.
By default it is false.

reference.description: This is a documentation field used for the rule assignment reference links.

regulator.description:
(-- api-linter: core::0203::required=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because it is only required when a different field is set and the given description is for informational use --)
Regulating body of the the rule assignment.
It is a required field when rule assignment source is 'REGULATORY'.

deadline.title: Informational field indicating in how many days the violation must be actioned

jurisdictionCountryCode.description:
(-- api-linter: core::0203::required=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because it is only required when a different field is set and the given description is for informational use --)
Jurisdiction country code.
It is a required field when rule assignment source is 'REGULATORY'.

terminationDate.description: Date and time when this rule assignment would be terminated.

constraintApplicabilityType.title:
The rule assignment's applicability using which we understand
whether the rule assignment has port group inheritance on the selected portfolios

assignmentName.title: The name of the rule assignment - used as a human-friendly identifier

resolutionRequiresFourEyesApproval.description:
The rule assignment's violation4EyesFlag flag.
By default it is false.

v1CustomizableRuleConfig.title: The rule configuration for a rule with test details - contains these, along with the rule severity

severity.description: The rule's severity instructs the system on what to do if the rule generates an exception.

testDetail.title: Defines test detail for the assignment rule

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'FilterComplianceRuleAssignments' call. Provide this to retrieve 
the subsequent page. When paginating, all other parameters provided to 'FilterComplianceRuleAssignments' 
must match the call that provided the page token.

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of ComplianceRuleAssignments to return. The service may return fewer than this value.
If unspecified, at most 100 ComplianceRuleAssignments will be returned. Values above 100 will be coerced to 100.

v1FilterComplianceRuleAssignmentsRespons.title:
The response message for ComplianceRuleAssignmentAPI.FilterComplianceRuleAssignments.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::response-message=disabled
  aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we want consistent names across endpoints but need a different message type here. --)

complianceRuleAssignments.description: The entities that match the specified FilterComplianceRuleAssignmentsRequest.

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

v1SimpleRuleConfig.title: The rule configuration for a rule without test details - just contains the rule severity

severity.description: The rule's severity instructs the system on what to do if the rule generates an exception.

v1TestDetail.title: Defines test details - only Concentration Rules can define this

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
